alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 8:43AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Steuben, eastern Allen, eastern De Kalb, northern Adams, eastern Branch, Hillsdale, Putnam, Defiance, Henry, Fulton, Paulding, Van Wert and Williams Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 843 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Reading to near Hicksville to near Berne. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hillsdale, Jonesville and Reading around 850 AM EDT. Bryan around 855 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Van Wert, Stryker, Delphos, Archbold, Ottoville, Wauseon, Delta, Kalida, Continental, Ottawa and Glandorf. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 153 and 156. Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams
